channel.title: Pivot Trees. on
channel.description: Recent content in Pivot Trees. on

item.title: Decision Trees.
item.description: How do we make updated decisions with major changes? How might we pivot as new information comes to light? Do we have to start over? Let’s run through scenarios. Coming Soon…

item.title: Managing Scope.
item.description: How do we make updated decisions with major changes? How might we pivot as new information comes to light? Do we have to start over? Let’s run through scenarios. Coming Soon

item.title: Potential Wins.
item.description: More coming Soon… Practical Use Case Demos Nothing quite beats the feelings of being overwhelmed with yet another lengthy resource, like pro-active demos with real use-cases practical for what your developers will face. Afterall, they initially just want to get in, do what they gotta do and then get out. BUT, once that initial step is clear, especially when it’s made easier for them, they are far more likely to come back and check it out; see what else is out there and available.
